title: default ████ creds on https://████████
content:
Description:
I can log into https://███ using █████ as credentials
Impact
Can do anything an ██████████ can do in this application, Server Now
Step-by-step Reproduction Instructions
go to https://███████
log in using ██████████
Suggested Mitigation/Remediation Actions
use proper authentication, this might be a test account but it should still not use ███ as the creds
Impact
logged in as ████ ██████ as shown in the screenshot
steps: Navigate to the target URL: https://███████
Log in using the default credentials: ██████████
vuln_description: The vulnerability involves the use of default credentials (█████) to log into the application at https://███████, granting the attacker the same privileges as an ██████████ user. This allows unauthorized access and potential misuse of the application's functionalities.
reason: The discovery of this vulnerability is straightforward as it only requires knowledge of the default credentials and the target URL. There are no complex interactions, state manipulations, or novel logic involved.
